title: [Azaton's Weaponry]
[Azaton's General Store]
[Azaton's Outfitting]
[Azaton's Combat Gear]
description: A midnight blue rising phoenix tapestry hangs on one of the mahogany paneled walls, and an ebonwood beam ceiling rises overhead.  An open-mawed greater vruul statue sits in one corner of a dark-stained oak floor.  There is an oval-shaped speckled marble counter on one side of the shop and a bamboo rack on the other.
